languages.text: {n}Абеляр машинально утирает пот со лба очень человечным, выразительным жестом — редкий момент, когда он позволяет возрасту и усталости проступить через броню самоуверенного командующего.{/n} "Нижние палубы — источник бесконечных проблем. Иногда я жалею, что всех местных нельзя заменить {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}сервиторами{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр машинально утирает пот со лба очень человечным, выразительным жестом — редкий момент, когда он позволяет возрасту и усталости проступить через броню самоуверенного командующего.{/n} "Нижние палубы — источник бесконечных проблем. Иногда я жалею, что всех местных нельзя заменить {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}сервиторами{/g}".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard reflexively wipes the sweat from his brow in a startlingly human gesture, and a telling one — a rare moment where he allows his age and weariness to show through his armour-like veneer of self-assurance.{/n} "The lower decks are a source of endless problems. Sometimes I dearly regret that we cannot replace all the locals with {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g}."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр машинально утирает пот со лба очень человечным, выразительным жестом — редкий момент, когда он позволяет возрасту и усталости проступить через броню самоуверенного командующего.{/n} "Нижние палубы — источник бесконечных проблем. Иногда я жалею, что всех местных нельзя заменить {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}сервиторами{/g}".

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德反射般地擦了擦额头上的汗水。这一刻，他一直以来如同盔甲一般的强硬姿态露出了疲态，年迈与疲惫占了上风。这样的情况非常罕见。{/n}“底层甲板总是会没完没了地发生问题。有的时候我感到很遗憾，因为我们没法用{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}机仆{/g}取代所有当地船员。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard reflexively wipes the sweat from his brow in a startlingly human gesture, and a telling one — a rare moment where he allows his age and weariness to show through his armour-like veneer of self-assurance.{/n} "The lower decks are a source of endless problems. Sometimes I dearly regret that we cannot replace all the locals with {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德反射般地擦了擦额头上的汗水。这一刻，他一直以来如同盔甲一般的强硬姿态露出了疲态，年迈与疲惫占了上风。这样的情况非常罕见。{/n}“底层甲板总是会没完没了地发生问题。有的时候我感到很遗憾，因为我们没法用{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}奴工{/g}取代所有当地船员。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}En un acto reflejo, Abelard se seca el sudor de la frente. Es un gesto sorprendentemente humano y revelador: uno de los escasos momentos donde permite que la edad y el cansancio atraviesen la férrea armadura de su confianza.{/n} «Las cubiertas inferiores son una fuente inagotable de problemas. A veces lamento profundamente no poder sustituir a la población por {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servidores{/g}».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard reflexively wipes the sweat from his brow in a startlingly human gesture, and a telling one — a rare moment where he allows his age and weariness to show through his armour-like veneer of self-assurance.{/n} "The lower decks are a source of endless problems. Sometimes I dearly regret that we cannot replace all the locals with {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}En un acto reflejo, Abelard se seca el sudor de la frente. Es un gesto sorprendentemente humano y revelador: uno de los escasos momentos donde permite que la edad y el cansancio atraviesen la férrea armadura de su confianza.{/n} «Las cubiertas inferiores son una fuente inagotable de problemas. A veces lamento profundamente no poder sustituir a la población por {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servidores{/g}».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは反射的に眉間の汗を拭った。しかし、その人間的な仕草は、鎧をまとったかのような彼の自己肯定のうわべから、年齢と倦怠が垣間見える貴重な瞬間を告げていた。{/n}「下層デッキは果てしない問題の宝庫です。現地の人間をすべて{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}サーヴィター{/g}に置き換えることができないことを、心から残念に思うこともあります」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard reflexively wipes the sweat from his brow in a startlingly human gesture, and a telling one — a rare moment where he allows his age and weariness to show through his armour-like veneer of self-assurance.{/n} "The lower decks are a source of endless problems. Sometimes I dearly regret that we cannot replace all the locals with {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは反射的に眉間の汗を拭った。しかし、その人間的な仕草は、鎧をまとったかのような彼の自己肯定のうわべから、年齢と倦怠が垣間見える貴重な瞬間を告げていた。{/n}「下層デッキは果てしない問題の宝庫です。現地の人間をすべて{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}サーヴィター{/g}に置き換えることができないことを、心から残念に思うこともあります」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard wischt sich reflexartig den Schweiß von der Stirn, eine überraschend menschliche Geste und auch eine vielsagende — ein seltener Augenblick, in dem er sein Alter und seine Erschöpfung durch seine Rüstung aus Selbstsicherheit durchscheinen lässt.{/n} "Die unteren Decks sind eine Quelle endloser Sorgen. Manchmal bereue ich es zutiefst, dass wir die Einheimischen nicht durch {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitoren{/g} ersetzen können."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard reflexively wipes the sweat from his brow in a startlingly human gesture, and a telling one — a rare moment where he allows his age and weariness to show through his armour-like veneer of self-assurance.{/n} "The lower decks are a source of endless problems. Sometimes I dearly regret that we cannot replace all the locals with {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard wischt sich reflexartig den Schweiß von der Stirn, eine überraschend menschliche Geste und auch eine vielsagende — ein seltener Augenblick, in dem er sein Alter und seine Erschöpfung durch seine Rüstung aus Selbstsicherheit durchscheinen lässt.{/n} "Die unteren Decks sind eine Quelle endloser Sorgen. Manchmal bereue ich es zutiefst, dass wir die Einheimischen nicht durch {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitoren{/g} ersetzen können."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard essuie machinalement la sueur sur son front dans un geste étonnamment humain venant de sa part. Un geste qui en dit long, car c'est l'un des rares moments où il s'autorise à laisser son âge et sa lassitude transparaître à travers la carapace d'assurance dont il ne se départ pour ainsi dire jamais.{/n} « Les ponts inférieurs sont une source de problèmes permanents. Parfois, je regrette amèrement qu'on ne puisse pas remplacer tous ces besogneux par des {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard reflexively wipes the sweat from his brow in a startlingly human gesture, and a telling one — a rare moment where he allows his age and weariness to show through his armour-like veneer of self-assurance.{/n} "The lower decks are a source of endless problems. Sometimes I dearly regret that we cannot replace all the locals with {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard essuie machinalement la sueur sur front dans un geste étonnamment humain venant de sa part. Un geste qui en dit long, car c'est l'un des rares moments où il s'autorise à laisser son âge et sa lassitude transparaître à travers la carapace d'assurance dont il ne se départ pour ainsi dire jamais.{/n} « Les ponts inférieurs sont une source de problèmes permanents. Parfois, je regrette amèrement qu'on ne puisse pas remplacer tous ces besogneux par des {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g}. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, kaşındaki teri hayli insani bir hareketle siliyor. Öyle ki bu ender rastlanan anda, zırh gibi kuşandığı öz güveninin ardına sakladığı yaşını ve yorgunluğunu gösteriyor.{/n} "Alt güverteler, sayısız meselenin yuvasıdır. Buradaki ahalinin yerine {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}hizmetör{/g} koyamadığımız için bazen kendime kızıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard reflexively wipes the sweat from his brow in a startlingly human gesture, and a telling one — a rare moment where he allows his age and weariness to show through his armour-like veneer of self-assurance.{/n} "The lower decks are a source of endless problems. Sometimes I dearly regret that we cannot replace all the locals with {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, kaşındaki teri hayli insani bir hareketle siliyor. Öyle ki bu ender rastlanan anda zırh gibi giydiği öz güveninin ardından yaşını ve yorgunluğunu gösteriyor.{/n} “Alt güverteler, sayısız meselenin yuvasıdır. Buradaki ahalinin yerine {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitörler{/g} koyamadığımız için bazen kendime kızıyorum.”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
